general_advisory: Crop Stage Advisory Paddy sowing to Tillering stage: Weed management...

advisory: Weed management: To control weed infestation in Paddy field use pre-emergence herbicide Pretilachlor 37 % EW @ 600ml/acre...

Fertilizer management: For high yielding paddy varieties, apply 35 kg Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting at active tillering stage. For hybrids apply 42-kg of Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting at active tillering stage...
Integrated pest management strategies should be followed to prevent both Whitefly infestation and YMV disease incidence starting from sowing of seeds...
Select YMV disease resistant varieties like PDM 139, PDM 11 etc...
To prevent whitefly infestation seeds should be treated with Imidacloprid @ 5-gram/kg of seeds before sowing...
Install 10 nos of yellow sticky traps starting from 2-3 leaf stage of the crop till pod maturity...

After heavy rainfall, Semilooper pest incidence is common in Cucurbits like Ridge gourd and snake Guard...
Go for spraying of neem-based pesticide (Neem Oil 15000 PPM) Azadiractin @ 600 ml/acre or Bacillus Thuringiensis @ 400 gm/acre by mixing it in 200-litre of water...
To manage the pest biologically use Trichogramma chilonis card (50,000 eggs/ha) @ 1/acre at weekly interval for 5 times by splitting each card into 12 pieces at the given perforations...
To manage the pest chemically, spray AlphaCyhalothrin @ 50-ml/acre or Thiachloprid @ 120 ml/acre during afternoon hours by mixing it with 200 litres of water...
Provide staking and make provision for drainage. To manage panama wilt, select disease-free planting material and resistant cultivar like Bantal, Robusta, Champa, Kabuli etc...

Banana suckers should be dipped with a solution of Carbendazim @ 10-gram/10-litre of water before planting followed by bimonthly drenching of soil around the pseudostem starting from 5 months after planting...
Heavy rainfall may decrease the salinity of water in the pond. Farmers are advised to apply alky-dimethyl-benzyl ammonium chloride (3ppm) as a disinfectant after cessation of rain...
Bamboo or nylon mesh screens should be erected at the inlets and outlets to prevent loss and entry of unwanted fish...
Nylon nets may be erected on bunds to prevent loss of fish with overflowing water...
